pages.text: As the world is made up of lots of different stones, it might be confusing on how to get cobblestone. Cobblestone is obtained by crushing most igneous or metamorphic $(world/stones)stones$(). At the start, this is achieved by $(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$().

pages.title: Intrusive Igneous Stone Generator
pages.text: As the title suggests there has been a tweak to the standard lava + water = cobblestone scheme. This tweak can be enabled/disabled in the config. By default, lava and flowing water will form a random intrusive igneous stones from Rankine. Using additional minerals in the genearator can allow for specific stone generation.

pages.title: Extrusive Igneous Stone Generator
pages.text: As the title suggests there has been a tweak to the standard basalt generator. This tweak can be enabled/disabled in the config. By default, lava flowing into blue ice over soul soil will form a random extrusive igneous stones from Rankine. Using additional minerals in the genearator can allow for specific stone generation.

pages.title: Metamorphic Stone Generator
pages.text: There has been a tweak to the standard stone generator. This tweak can be enabled/disabled in the config. By default, lava flowing onto water source blocks will form a random metamorphic stones from Rankine. Using additional stones in the genearator can allow for specific stone generation.
